name: Tilebender
description:
Tilebender!

THROW PLATAFORMS AT YOUR FRIENDS AND WATCH THEM CRY IN PURE SALT AND AGONY!

The objective of the game is to kill the other player by punching walls at them. Win 3 rounds and prove that you're the best breaker of walls in your neighborhood!

Ground pound blocks to make them levitate, and then punch them to throw them at your opponents! Don't forget to maneuver your way through the battlefield by dashing and walljumping.

Controllers are highly recommended.

Controls:

Player 1:

Walk: WASD or D-PAD. 

Punch: C or SQUARE

Jump: V or CROSS

Dash: B or CIRCLE/L2

Ground Pound (activate plataforms): Down while jumping

Player 2:

Walk: Arrow keys or D-PAD. 

Punch: J or SQUARE

Jump: K or CROSS

Dash: L or CIRCLE/L2

Ground Pound (activate plataforms): Down while jumping

Made by Arthur Medeiros and Caio Rodrigues at GDS Game Jam 2017 in under 36 hours with the theme "Unconventional Weapons".
